title: Material) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 384 of 2011) are amended in Regulation
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Communities 
(Marketing of Fruit Plant Propagating Material) (Amendment) Regulations
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european community (marketing fruit plant propagating material) (amendment) regulation

title: Material) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 384 of 2011) are amended in Regulation
Material) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 384 of 2011) are amended in Regulation
heading: 2. The European Communities (Marketing of Fruit Plant Propagating
text_raw:
2. The European Communities (Marketing of Fruit Plant Propagating 
Material) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 384 of 2011) are amended in Regulation 
2(1) by substituting for the definition of “Directive”, the following – 

“‘Directive’ means Council Directive 2008/90/EC of 29 September 20083 
(as amended by Regulation (EU) No 652/2014 of the European Parliament 
and of the Council of 15 May 20144, Commission Implementing Decision 
(EU) 2016/159 of 4 February 20165, Commission Implementing Decision 
(EU) 2016/1887 of 24 October 20166, Commission Implementing 
Decision (EU) 2019/120 of 24 January 20197 and Commission 
Implementing Decision (EU) 2022/1933 of 12 October 2022),Commission 
Implementing Directive 2014/96/EU of 15 October 20148 (as amended by 
Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 2019/1813 of 29 October 
20199), Commission Implementing Directive 2014/97/EU of 15 October 
201410 and Commission Implementing Directive 2014/98/EU of 15 
October 201411 (as amended by Commission Directive (EU) 2020/177 of 
11 February 2020 and Commission Implementing Directive (EU) 
2022/2438 of 12 December 2022);”. 

1 OJ L 266 13.10.2022, p.19 
2 OJ L 319 13.12.2022, p.54 
3 OJ L 267 08.10.2008, p.8 
4 OJ L 189, 27.6.2014, p.1 
5 OJ L 31, 6.2.2016, p.51 
6 OJ L 291, 26.10.2016, p.15 
7 OJ L24, 28.01.2019, p. 26 
8 OJ L 298, 16.10.2014, p.12 
9 OJ L 278, 30.10.2019, p.7 
10 OJ L 298, 16.10.2014, p.16 
11 OJ L298, 16.10.2014, p.22 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 6th June, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3. The European Communities (Marketing of Fruit Plant Propagating 

Material (Amendment) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 199 of 2020) are revoked. 

[283] 3 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 June, 2023. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [283]

title: Material) Regulations 2011 (S.I. No. 384 of 2011) are amended in Regulation
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations update existing Legislation with regard to the minimum 
quality standards and controls on the marketing within the European Union of 
fruit plant propagating material and fruit plants intended for fruit production. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [283] 5 

BAILE ÁTHA CLIATH 
ARNA FHOILSIÚ AG OIFIG AN tSOLÁTHAIR
